name: Year 2
description:
A casual puzzle game about spring cleaning. Remove weeds, logs, and rocks with the least amount of actions.

Daily challenge refresh every day. You can retry it and get the highest possible score in that exact configuration.
Randomizer is a game mode where you rely on both luck and strategy. Good luck!

Controls

WASD
MovementLeft Click
Selection

Credits and Stuff

Made by melonbreadjin

Font : Rob Graves by Kevin Richey
